title: Cursor 2.2: Debug Mode and Plan Mode Improvements
description: Cursor released version 2.2 featuring Debug Mode for reproducing and fixing tricky bugs, enhanced Plan Mode with visual planning, Multi-Agent Judging, and Pinned Chats for better workflow organization.

title: Claude Code Slack Integration
description: Anthropic launched Claude Code integration with Slack, allowing developers to @mention Claude directly in Slack threads to delegate coding tasks through natural conversation.

community_feedback.quote: This @anthropic Claude Code workflow is insane: Tag @claude in a GitHub issue, it writes code and opens a PR. You just review and merge
Claude AI Now Works Inside Slack â€“ This Could Change [development workflows]
a bigger deal than it sounds

title: Copilot Coding Agent Model Picker
description: GitHub introduced a model picker for Copilot coding agent, allowing Pro and Pro+ subscribers to select different AI models for their coding tasks.
